div.p: We now offer a publicly available wireless network called PCSD Public. It does not have a password on it so anyone can connect to it. Students may connect to this wifi from a vehicle/near the building.

The Plum City Educational Community will provide a positive learning environment in which students can excel in academics, arts, and extracurricular activities, developing respectful, responsible, and productive citizens.
